senses.sense_definition: An English surname, originally meaning the son of Ben or Benedict.

examples.text: Mr. <w>Benson</w> has been teaching history at the high school for twenty years.
Please tell Ms. <w>Benson</w> that her package has arrived at the front desk.

senses.sense_definition: The name of several places in the United Kingdom, the United States, and Canada, including a village in Oxfordshire and a city in Arizona.

examples.text: They decided to stop in <w>Benson</w> for lunch while driving through Arizona.
The village of <w>Benson</w> is located near the River Thames in England.
